#summary ReleaseNotes 0.8.2

Updates:

 * new SLCS-client for AAF

New features:

 * Dynamic objects can display metadata in the file list table. Please see [https://projects.arcs.org.au/trac/davis/wiki/HowTo/DynamicObjects here] for details.

Bug Fixes:

 * 'Funny' characters in file names are handled much better now due to a complete overhaul of JSON and HTML generation code.
